Newton Developer Technical Information: Newton Programmer's Guide: 2.1 OS Addendum /
Chapter 11 - Miscellaneous / Reference

Functions and Methods

The following methods and functions are either new to Newton 2.1 OS, have changed since previous OS releases, or have existed but were not previously documented. Unless otherwise noted in the COMPATIBILTY section of a function's description, all functions described here are new to Newton 2.1 OS.
